title: What is a widely loved video game or video game series you can't stand? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm sorry but I have to say Call of Duty. You see, I love fps but Call of Duty almost gives them a bad rap. The repetitive storylines just get boring after a while. Also, you don't have to throw zombies into everything. Now with the release of games like advanced warfare, where you have to buy dlcs to play the game, I've given up on the series. The first few games are fun. But the rest ruined the whole series for me. It's a case of “Learning to let it die”.
